name: RSS Read Tool
semantic_context: Reads data from an RSS Feed
natural_language_description: 这是 RSS Read Tool 节点。主要用于: Reads data from an RSS Feed

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Reads data from an RSS Feed
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Reads data from an RSS Feed | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL of the RSS feed | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of custom fields to include in the output. For example, "author, contentSnippet".
ignoreSSL (值: None) - Whether to ignore SSL/TLS certificate issues or not
